events.name: X-record
info:
1st set of songs from X-record; originally unlocked by playing either SOUND VOLTEX on the Valkyrie model, or beatmaniaIIDX on the Lightning model.
Not implemented yet

2nd set of songs from X-record; originally unlocked by playing either SOUND VOLTEX on the Valkyrie model, or beatmaniaIIDX on the Lightning model.
Not implemented yet

2nd set of songs from X-record; originally unlocked by playing either SOUND VOLTEX on the Valkyrie model, or beatmaniaIIDX on the Lightning model.
Not implemented yet

events.name: グレイスからの挑戦状!! (GRACE kara no chousenjou!!)
info:
Enables unlock for the song 'ドゥサンコオデッセイ!!' by cosMo＠暴走P upon logging in.
This song is originally unlocked by having played it first on the コナステ (Konasute) version of Sound Voltex.

Enables unlock for the song 'αzalea' by BlackY upon logging in.
This song is originally unlocked by having played it first on the コナステ (Konasute) version of Sound Voltex.

Enables unlock for the song 'BAYONEX' by かめりあ as "Revenge of Riot" upon logging in.
This song is originally unlocked by having played it first on the コナステ (Konasute) version of Sound Voltex.

Enables unlock for the song 'Reverenced Flower' by ぺのれり upon logging in.
This song is originally unlocked by having played it first on the コナステ (Konasute) version of Sound Voltex.

Enables unlock for the song '《Re:miniscence》' by かねこちはる upon logging in.
This song is originally unlocked by having played it first on the コナステ (Konasute) version of Sound Voltex.

events.name: BPL応援 楽曲解禁スタンプラリー (BPL ouen gakkyoku kaikin stamp rally)
events.info:
Songs in this event are originally unlocked by accessing the official BEMANI PRO LEAGUE 2021 website and obtaining the stamp by watching VODs of the BPL competition.
Enable this option to activate this event.

events.name: BEMANI 2021真夏の歌合戦5番勝負 (BEMANI 2021 manatsu no utagassen 5 ban shoubu)
events.info:
This is a cross-BEMANI event. Songs are originally unlocked by playing participating BEMANI games and earn 'Yell' points.
Enable this option to activate this event.

events.name: SOUND VOLTEX 10th Anniversary
events.info:
Stamp event to unlock 7 songs in any order.
Toggle this on to enable this stamp event.

events.name: REFLEC BEAT Song Stamp Event
events.info:
Stamp event to unlock 5 songs originally from the REFLEC BEAT game series.
Toggle this on to enable this stamp event.

events.name: いちかのごちゃまぜMix UP！ (Ichika no gochamaze Mix UP! )
events.info:
This is a cross-BEMANI event. Songs include some that are shared from other BEMANI games and some that are mashup/remixes of the shared songs. These are originally unlocked by playing participating BEMANI games and earning points to fill different gauges.

Enable this option to activate this event.

events.name: BEMANI PRO LEAGUE -SEASON 2-! Original Song
info:
Toggle to have the songs from the 1st week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Songs: 'Chat perché' and 'WINNING ROAD'

Toggle to have the songs from the 2nd week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Songs: 'ENDGAME' and 'ИADIR'

Toggle to have the songs from the 3rd week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Songs: 'Ice Fortress' and 'MURASAME'

Toggle to have the songs from the 4th week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Songs: 'Initiating League' and 'Scat Jazz Dance'

Toggle to have the songs from the 5th week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Songs: '最果ての勇者にラブソングを' and '灼ナル刃、破カヰ譜'

Toggle to have the songs from the 6th week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Songs: 'Fl0ating:' and 'Petit espoir'

Toggle to have the songs from the 7th week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Songs: 'Paradigm Shift' and 'イグノアザーズ'

Toggle to have the songs from the 8th week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Songs: 'Thousand Triggers' and 'trea→journey'

Toggle to have the song from the 9th week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Song: 'MILITARY R04D'

Toggle to have the song from the 10th week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Song: 'DEUX EX MĀXHINĀ'

Toggle to have the song from the 11th week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Song: 'All We Need is HAPPY END!!!'

Toggle to have the song from the 12th week unlocked on the next login.
Otherwise, the songs are still unlockable through BLASTER GATE.
Song: 'Glory of Fighters'

events.name: PCBおかわりスタンプイベント | PCB Refill Stamp Event
events.info:
Stamp event to earn PCB. Once the stamp goal is complete, it will start over and you can earn more PCB.
Toggle this on to enable this stamp event.

events.name: んだんだぺったん☆二〇二三 | New Year 2023 Stamp Event
events.info:
Stamp event to unlock the んだんだぺったん☆二〇二三 appeal card.
Toggle this on to enable this stamp event.

events.name: HIMEHINAコラボイベント | HIMEHINA Collab Stamp Event
events.info:
Stamp event to unlock the HIMEHINA crew.
Toggle this on to enable this stamp event.

events.name: ボルテ11周年★記念限定カード | SOUND VOLTEX 11th Anniversary Stamp Event
events.info:
Stamp event to unlock the ボルテ11周年★記念限定カード appeal card to commemorate 11 years of SOUND VOLTEX.
Toggle this on to enable this stamp event.

events.name: Commemorating BEMANI PRO LEAGUE -SEASON 2-! Original Song Contest Special Stamp Event
events.info:
Stamp event to unlock 9 songs, including SuddeИDeath. Songs can be unlocked in any order, except for SuddeИDeath, which will be available to unlock once all the other songs are unlocked.
Toggle this on to enable this stamp event.
